title: Twitter’s earnings falter as it fights with Elon Musk.
abstract: The social media company swung to a loss in the second quarter and cited “uncertainty” over its pending takeover by the billionaire Tesla chief executive as a factor.
byline: By Kate Conger and Adam Satariano

multimedia.caption: Twitter again declined to hold an earnings call with Wall Street analysts, avoiding potential questions about Elon Musk’s impact on the business.
Twitter again declined to hold an earnings call with Wall Street analysts, avoiding potential questions about Elon Musk’s impact on the business.

title: Snap reports its slowest quarterly growth and a wider loss in the second quarter.
abstract: The company declined to forecast its future financial performance, citing “uncertainties related to the operating environment.”

title: Amazon to acquire One Medical clinics in latest push into health care.
abstract: The $3.9 billion deal is Amazon’s latest acquisition in the health care industry. In 2018, it acquired PillPack, an online pharmacy.

title: Why Big Tech Is Making a Big Play for Live Sports
abstract: Competing for rights to broadcast games from the N.F.L. and other leagues could be hard for broadcast and cable companies that “aren’t playing by the same financial rules.”

multimedia.caption: Tech companies, eager to expand their streaming audiences, increasingly see live sports as a way to do it.

title: Google Fires Engineer Who Claims Its A.I. Is Conscious
abstract: The engineer, Blake Lemoine, contends that the company’s language model has a soul. The company denies that and says he violated its security policies.

title: Apple Agrees to $50 Million Settlement Over Butterfly Keyboard Complaints
abstract: A class-action lawsuit represented customers who sought repairs for the troubled MacBook keyboard, released in certain laptops from 2015 to 2019. Many were frustrated by typing errors.

multimedia.caption: The butterfly keyboard, a thin model that aimed to provide more precision, led to complaints from users of MacBook Pros and other models frustrated by typing mishaps.

title: Cryptomining Capacity in U.S. Rivals Energy Use of Houston, Findings Show
